If you don't want to operate outside certain countries, don't offer your app there.

The worst app imaginable. Fundamentally broken for foreign users in Japan. Softbank's registration system is categorically unable to verify foreign identification, rendering the entire app useless. When attempting to register, the system states "not possible to perform" - a clear indication that the app is exclusively designed for Japanese nationals. Beyond the registration failure, the app is invasive and poorly constructed. Accidentally exposed customer private information, intrusive .

LINE just keeps on reducing features all the time. Last update, the included emoji suite has been removed to encourage users to purchase more on the store. LINE Out, was removed which was a convenient feature for calling international numbers. LINE Keep, was removed with an attempt to transition to the less convenient Keep Memo. After so much feature removal, I wonder what LINE will have to offer to compete with the other powerhouse chat apps that are consistently more attractive each update
